serinfo.issue: 2008 World, Europe, United States, Canada, and Mexico

descript.abstract:
World Latitude and Longitude Grid is a polygon theme representing a 5 by 5 degree latitude/longitude grid covering the world with attributes that allow you to display grids at intervals of 5, 10, 15, 20, and 30 degrees. To display a grid with a 5-degree interval, simply display all of the lines. To display a coarser grid, for example, a 15-degree interval, define the theme properties as lines with the Degree15 attribute equal to Y.
This dataset is a part of the 2008 ESRI Data and Maps Collection.
descript.purpose: World Latitude and Longitude Grid provides latitude and longitude lines for use as an overlay for world level maps.

cntinfo.cntinst:
In the United States: Please direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing and consulting services to your local ESRI Regional Office. For support, you may contact ESRI Support Center by telephone (voice) between 6:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. Pacific time, Monday through Friday, by dialing 888-377-4575; facsimile (fax) available at 909-792-0960; electronic mail (e-mail) support@esri.com; or visit http://support.esri.com/; ESRI holidays excluded.
Outside the United States Please direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing, sales, support, and consulting services to your local ESRI International Distributor. This information can be found at http://gis.esri.com/intldist/contact/.
For other questions or comments, you may contact ESRI headquarters by e-mail, telephone, or fax or write to us.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.3.0.800

dataqual.logic: The shapefile is converted to SDC (Smart Data Compression) format using either ESRI SDC Data Development Kit Professional 2 (DDKP2) or tools in ArcGIS. The SDC data set is then loaded into ArcSDE to verify and validate the geometry.
dataqual.complete: After processing, the data set is checked for drawing display and number of records and file sizes compared with source materials.

horizpa.horizpar: The geospatial part of this data set was mathematically generated using the ARC/INFO GRID extension. In this manner, the locations were computed. The positional accuracy is limited only by the resolution of the data set, which is less than a meter.

procstep.procdesc: The following steps were performed by ESRI: Generated the geospatial part of this data set mathematically using the ARC/INFO GRID extension. Added attributes.

The following steps were performed by ESRI: Extracted data set from ESRI Data & Maps Volume 1. Removed unneeded attributes. Created ArcGIS layer file (.lyr). Created ArcView GIS legend file (.avl). Ran ArcView GIS Avenue request ExportClean, and created spatial indices.

The following steps were performed by ESRI: Removed all the default ArcInfo attributes -- FNODE_, TNODE_, LPOLY_, RPOLY_, LENGTH, LATLONG_, LATLONG_ID. Created ArcGIS layer file (.lyr), projection file (.prj), and spatial indices. Converted the data set to SDC.
The following steps were performed by ESRI: Added KILOMETERS attribute and calculated its values. Added MILES attribute and calculated its values.

geodetic.horizdn: This data set was mathematically generated. You can define or use it unchanged with data based on any datum.

enttyp.enttypd: The lines represent a 5 by 5 degree latitude/longitude grid for the world.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The degree value and the latitude or longitude directional reference of the grid line.
The indicator whether a grid line is part of the 10 by 10 degree grid.

edom.edomvd: The grid line is part of the 10 by 10 degree grid.
The grid line is not part of the 10 by 10 degree grid.

attr.attrdef: The indicator whether a grid line is part of the 15 by 15 degree grid.

edom.edomvd: The grid line is part of the 15 by 15 degree grid.
The grid line is not part of the 15 by 15 degree grid.

attr.attrdef: The indicator whether a grid line is part of the 20 by 20 degree grid.

edom.edomvd: The grid line is part of the 20 by 20 degree grid.
The grid line is not part of the 20 by 20 degree grid.

attr.attrdef: The indicator whether a grid line is part of the 30 by 30 degree grid.

edom.edomvd: The grid line is part of the 30 by 30 degree grid.
The grid line is not part of the 30 by 30 degree grid.

attr.attrdef: The measure of distance in miles.
The measure of distance in kilometers.
